nodes.text: Luke Skywalker: Detective was a comic appearing in Star Wars Tales 20.

Sometime during his teenage years, Luke Skywalker was challenged to a speeder race by a local braggart, Gorm Maldorf, in The Cage. On the morning of the race, Gorm's decapitated body was found in The Cage. Skywalker began his own investigation of the death, and with the help of Obi-Wan Kenobi, he deduced that Gorm had been accidentally killed by his companion Chester the night before, while attempting to rig The Cage for the race.
